name: Marcus Summerour
text: Take N Bake. First was introduced to Papa Murphy's in southern Arizona years ago and me and my family made it a Thursday night tradition. I was glad to see that there was a Papa Murphy's here when I moved to San Antonio. So many options and selections. Fresh vegetables and toppings. Staff is always polite and courteous.

name: jerry leonard
text: The place is closed!!! This location is out of business. Love papa Murphyâ€™s, but this location is closed signs on the door state they havenâ€™t paid their rent.

name: chris chris
text: Papa Murphy's is always good!!

name: Cedric Colon
text: Been here twice. The two young ladies that have served me are by far the friendliest I've dealt with. And the bonus: their pizzas are delicious!

name: David Hartman
text: Papa Murphy's is such a great addition to our neighborhood!  The pies always have fresh ingredients and tastes great. The staff is professional, clean and takes pride in their work. They're lighting quick and the 10 dollar Tuesday is a great deal! I hope more people use this place because I'd hate to see it go away.

name: Robin N
text: This location is awesome, they are always prompt and provide me good quality ingredients. Everything I have ordered has been fresh and bakes just right. I have ordered from here a few different times. If something isn't right, which is rarely is, you can always call them and they are quick to make it right.

name: James Wallace
text:
Iâ€™ve been coming to this store for two years now and used to love it.
I want to first  say that I was not personally slighted.
How ever the professionalism has dropped so much that my walk-in experience felt â€¦More

name: Maria C
text: I enjoy going in, Satia is a delight. I've been in every week since she started working there. I go for my gluten- free pizza. I used to go to the Bandera location. The pizzas are great and the service too. It's always clean. My son goes â€¦More

name: Frank Franco
text: Ok service and the pizza dough was old but normally this place is great.

name: Don Fite
text: Excellent value.  Yes, you still need to bake the pizza at your home, but a million times better than frozen, and at least 10 times better than your regular takeout - ant Tuesdays $10 any large pizza sweetens the deal!

name: Alexander DeLeon
text: The best place for stuffed meat pizza! My kids love this place!

name: T. Ferg.
text: I accidentally clicked the wrong time when ordering online. I called the store to have the time changed and the employees were very understanding. 5 stars for the awesome staff at this location!

name: Toya Easterday
text: Great spot for good pizza with friends and family! Can't go wrong

name: Jason Mata
text: Simply the best sesame chicken available in SA

name: Joey V
text: Staff is friendly and helpful. The best part of this business is that the pizza is made fresh and you are free to make it when you're ready. The prices are reasonable and the food is plentiful.

name: Matthew Klemm
text: This place is the best Papa Murphy's we've ever had. They always put plenty of sauce and toppings on. Beats dominoes by a texas mile.

name: Marsha Weston
text: Today, 15Jan2019 I was at your shop. It was 11:30am. Open sign was on; but front door was locked. I banged on door several times. No one came. So, today I did not get a pizza. Please change your signs to the hours you are open.

name: Dr. Phil Spears
text: Absolutely a great way to get a Terrific Pizza for less than half the price of most other pizzas. Whats more you take it home and bake it so you are all set when it's done. Fabulous!

name: John H
text: The service is great! When you walk in the door, they look you right in the eye and say "Howdy!" Good start to pleasing the customer! If you don't already know, you build your own pizza at Papa Murphys. Get a variety of toppings and pile on â€¦More

name: Andrew Gorneault
text: Friendly people great pizzq

name: Lester Smith
text: Best pizza around and good prices

name: Mark Santos
text: Name says it all.  They make the pizza, though take it home and bake it.  Generous toppings,  and good flavors.

name: Zack Baldwin
text: This place is closed. The landlord changed the locks. What!

name: Daniel Moss
text: Notice that the 2 pizzas we bought today where not like they have been in the past the dough did not rise at all the onions had a bad taste

name: Liz Sams
text: This is the best take and bake. The stuffed pizzas are amazing!!

name: Patricia Campos
text: A must try it is awesome. Nice employees great pizza.  Keep it up.

name: Marinda Brown
text: I love that I can cook my pizza to how I like it

name: Jennifer Monsivais
text: Love their pizza. Always loaded with toppings and I receive all their coupons

name: oxana bulford
text: I love this place, employees are polite. All ingredients are fresh.

name: SuperMommy x6
text: I love the pizza here,  my kids always pick Hawaiian and my bf and I the veggie delight

name: Lucy Ramey
text: Absolutely love the pizza. At least once a week. U have got to try it!!

name: Ryan Irish
text: Order ahead and pick up. Cooking is easy and we like the garlic chicken pizza

name: Adam Skerven
text: Great pizza and live. The staff are very kind.

name: Michael Spina
text: Good pizza to take and bake yourself. Taste better and is cheaper then any delivery

name: Shane Lawson
text: Dope pizza! Super affordable and surprisingly very good even though you have to bake it!

name: Anthony Millsap
text: Prompt and courteous! Great pizza!

name: christopher rekrut
text: Always pleased with service and food quality. So much better than any delivery crap out there and at half the price.

name: Alex Swierski
text: The stuffed pizza is bomb.

name: Dick Parchem
text: Always the best pizza ever

name: Natalie Vatcher
text: Good gluten free pizza

name: Daniel Rivera
text: Lots of toppings

name: S Flores
text: Always good pizza

name: Yolanda Martin
text: Always fresh and delicious

name: Jonathan Tejada
text: Woah

name: Lou Harrigil
text: love their pizza

name: John Quinby
text: No more Papa John's, Pizza Hut, or Dominos.

name: Ricardo Botello
text: Man their salad's are great

name: Elizabeth Gehl
text: Love pizza and it's good pizza.

name: Adela C
text: ðŸ‘Œ good place to build your pizza!

name: Tisha Rodriguez
text: Favorite location!! They always have friendly staff.

name: Heather Holt
text: Would live if there were more locations.

name: Jazzy Love
text: Good food

name: Lonaan Green
text: Very good, fresh toppings,  love the thin crust.
